p: Out of 21,903 detected genes, a total of 4355 genes were differentially expressed 7 days after transplantation and 3233 genes were differentially expressed 15 days after transplantation (FDR <0.05). A total of 2291 genes and 1893 genes were downregulated and 2065 and 1341 were upregulated after 7 and 15 days after transplantation, respectively ( Figure 2).
